description: Menu label used in the tipline bot
Menu label used in the tipline bot when multiple languages are collapsed in a single menu option
Menu description used in the tipline bot when multiple languages are collapsed in a single menu option (always plural)
Subtitle displayed in tipline settings page for the main menu if the tipline is enabled for WhatsApp and at least one more platform.
defaultMessage: Please note that some messaging services have different menu display options than others.

description: Counter that is displayed on tipline settings page in order to inform the user how many options they can still add to the bot main menu.
Title of an alert box displayed on tipline main menu settings page when there are more than 10 options.
defaultMessage: There are {numberOfOptions} options including all languages on this workspace. Only {numberOfLanguages} languages will be sent to users when they select the 'Languages' option.

description: Title of the main menu third section of the tipline where there is more than one supported language
Title of the main menu third section of the tipline when there is only one supported language
